// AdminDashboard.jsx import React, { useState, useRef } from 'react'; import { Container, Card, Button, Table, Form, Spinner } from 'react-bootstrap'; import './AdminDashboard.css'; const AdminDashboard = () => { const [filteredLearners, setFilteredLearners] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [searchRollNo, setSearchRollNo] = useState(''); const reportRef = useRef(); const handleSearch = () => { if (!searchRollNo) return; setLoading(true); fetch('https://sheetdb.io/api/v1/131pnl5khpeib') .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => { const filtered = data.filter( (learner) => learner.RollNo && learner.RollNo.trim() === searchRollNo.trim() ); setFilteredLearners(filtered); setLoading(false); }) .catch((err) => { console.error('Error fetching learner data:', err); setLoading(false); }); }; return (
setSearchRollNo(e.target.value)} className="me-3 w-50 text-center" /> {loading ? (
) : filteredLearners.length > 0 ? (

AHMEDABAD CENTRE

Address: 1st and 2nd floor, Zion Z1, Sindhu Bhavan Marg, near Maple County Road, Bodakdev, Ahmedabad, Gujarat 380054

Learner Information
Learner Name Batch Name Roll No Contact No Session
{filteredLearners[0]["Student Name"]} {filteredLearners[0].Batch} {filteredLearners[0].RollNo} {filteredLearners[0]["Contact No"]} 2025-26
Attendance Report 2025-26
APRMAYJUNJUL AUGSEPOCTNOV DECJANFEB
{filteredLearners[0].APR} {filteredLearners[0].MAY} {filteredLearners[0].JUN} {filteredLearners[0].JUL} {filteredLearners[0].AUG} {filteredLearners[0].SEP} {filteredLearners[0].OCT} {filteredLearners[0].NOV} {filteredLearners[0].DEC} {filteredLearners[0].JAN} {filteredLearners[0].FEB}
Learner Performance Report
{filteredLearners.map((learner, idx) => ( ))}
S.NO. EXAM DATE TEST NAME PHY CHEM MATH BIO TOTAL %AGE RANK MAX. MARKS
{idx + 1} {learner["Exam Date"]} {learner["TestName"]} {learner["Phy"]} {learner["Chem"]} {learner["Math"]} {learner["Bio"]} {learner["Total"]} {learner["%AGE"]} {learner["Rank"]} {learner["Max. Marks"]}
) : ( searchRollNo && (
No data found for Roll No: {searchRollNo}
) )}
); }; export default AdminDashboard;
